name: thesplit.is clone
description: A private copy of the https://thesplit.is zero-knowledge, encrypted, secret sharing web app. Don't trust us? Run your own!

REDIS_URL.description: The full Redis URL connection string. You may need to copy this from an add-on vendor environment variable.

PUMA_WORKERS.description: How many Puma server workers to start

PUMA_THREADS.description: How many Puma server threads per worker

VAULT_ADDR.description: The connection URI for the Hashicorp Vault server

VAULT_TOKEN.description: The authentication token for the Hashicorp Vault server

SIDEKIQ_USERNAME.description: The Basic Auth username for /sidekiq admin page.

SIDEKIQ_PASSWORD.description: The Basic Auth password for /sidekiq admin page.

TIERION_ENABLED.description: Should blockchain anchor services be enabled?

TIERION_USERNAME.description: The username for the Tierion blockchain anchor API

TIERION_PASSWORD.description: The password for the Tierion blockchain anchor API

TIERION_SUBSCRIPTION_CALLBACK_URI.description: The Tierion Hash API Subscription Callback URI to receive payloads

SITE_NAME.description: The name of this web site for use in headers and titles

SITE_DOMAIN.description: The domain of this web site

SITE_TAGLINE.description: The tagline of this web site

SITE_OWNER_NAME.description: The full name of the operator of this site

SITE_OWNER_EMAIL.description: The email address of the operator of this site

SITE_OWNER_TWITTER.description: The Twitter account (without @ sign) of the operator of this site
